vsch.ponder.thrusters.text_1: Thrusters need to be powered with redstone to thrust
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_1: By default, thrusters are in POSITION mode
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_2: This means they will apply force based on where they are
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_3: However, this can cause unwanted rotation
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_4: Using a wrench, a thruster can be changed to GLOBAL mode
vsch.ponder.thruster_modes.text_5: In GLOBAL mode it applies force without position
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_1: Sometimes, it can be hard to slow down in space
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_2: This is where the drag inducer comes in
vsch.ponder.drag_inducer.text_3: When powered with redstone, the drag inducer will try to slow you down in all directions
advancement.vsch.steel_ingot.desc: Create Steel Ingots by Mixing Powdered Obsidian and Iron ingots in your Blaze-heated Mechanical Mixer
advancement.vsch.vigorite_alloy.desc: Create Vigorite Alloys by Mixing Cinder Flour and Steel Ingots in your Blaze-heated Mechanical Mixer
advancement.vsch.drag_inducer: This is such a DRAG (get it?)
advancement.vsch.drag_inducer.desc: This is such a DRAG (get it?)
advancement.vsch.air_thruster.desc: Travel to the Moon with a Space Nodule to obtain Silicon
advancement.vsch.thruster.desc: Upgrade the Small Thruster to increase your Thrusters output
advancement.vsch.powerful_thruster: Where No Man has Gone Before
advancement.vsch.powerful_thruster.desc: Craft 4 Medium Thrusters and Combine them to Obtain the Final Thruster
advancement.vsch.sulphuric_acid_roll: Only safe if eaten in a Bath-Tub
advancement.vsch.sulphuric_acid_roll.des:
Not too Great for your Health...
§7(Hidden Advancement)
